duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform procedures relative to the physiological management of patients' circulatory and respiratory functions during and following cardiac surgery, under the direct supervision of the anesthesiologist and operating surgeon.
Demonstrate well-developed interpersonal skills and communication skills necessary to interact in a professional manner with nursing staff, health care team members, patient and families.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Perfusion Technology or related field (Master's preferred)
